fullText: I am getting close to my 14th anniversary on X/Twitter. Reflecting on my time here, I was looking back at the numbers from those years. I learned that I averaged ~15,000 new followers per year during the first 4 years; and I have averaged ~42,000 per year over the past 10 years.
